pages.text: Sihamte arau ka’ba ye, ‘ki ha’la, ami yisakala lokaka beya buli ganya karaichilo sihamtaka dekhuna (iyata) dekha poraa na'i’
‘Ami sihamtaka ene'i upaluna karaichilo neki, ne sihamtara bisaye amara drsti bibhrama ghatiche’
niscaya e'ito bastara satya, jahannamisakalara eya parasparaika bada-pratibada
Koraa, ‘ma'ihe kerala ejana satarkakarai mathona arau allahara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, te'om ekaka, prabala pratapasali
‘Teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata thaka sakalo bastura raba, prabala paraakramasali, parama ksamasila’
Koraa, ‘e'ito eta mahasambada
‘yitora paraa tomaloke bimukha hai acha
‘Urd'dhaloka samparke mora kono jnana nachila yetiya te'omloke badanubada karaichila
‘Mora ocarata e'i ahi ahiche ye, ma'i kerala ejana satarkakarai mathona’
Smarana karaa, yetiya tomara pratipalake phiraistasakalaka kaichila, ‘ma'i alatiya boka matirae manuha srsti karaima
‘eteke yetiya ami te'omka susama karaima arau tata mora rauha sancara karaima, tetiya tomaloke te'omra prati chajadaranata ha’ba’
‘Tetiya phiraistasakala ataye chajadaranata ha’la
kerala ibalichara bahirae, si ahankara karaile arau kaphirabilakara antarbhukta ha’la

Allahe ka’le, ‘he ibalicha! Ma'i yaka mora duhaterae srsti karaicho, te'omra prati chajadaranata ha’balai tomaka kihe badha pradana karaile? Tumi ahankara karaila neki? Ne tumi adhika ucca maryadasampanna’
si ka’le, ‘ma'i te'omtakai sraestha. Tumi moka agnirae srsti karaicha arau te'omka srsti karaicha alatiya boka matirae’
Te'om ka’le, ‘tumi iyara paraa ola'i yoraa, kiyano niscaya tumi abhisapta
‘Arau niscaya tomara oparata mora abhisapa thakiba, karmaphala dirasa laike’
Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Eteke tumi moka arakasa diya se'i dina laike yidina sihamtaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’ba’
Te'om ka’le, ‘yoraa, niscaya tumi arakasa praaptabilakara antarbhukta
‘nirdharaita samaya upasthita horaara dina laike’
Si ka’le, ‘tomara ksamata-sanmanara sapata! Arasye ma'i sihamtara ata'ike pathabhrasta karaima
‘kintu sihamtara majara tomara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae’
